para.displaydata:
- SPD FLY..........................................................................THE GREEN
Fly within the green area of the speed scale to ensure safe flight. For slats/flaps retraction, it is better to fly at the top of the green area of the speed scale.....

- CAUTION
The altitude displayed on the PFD is a GPS altitude

- BACK UP NAV.............................................................................USE
When all ADR’s are OFF, both FM’s are lost. Revert to Back Up Nav via the NAV B/UP prompt on the MCDU MENU page.

MAN CAB PR CTL

TGT V/A : CLIMB 500 FT/MIN
DESC 300 FT/MIN

para.displaydata:
FOR APPROACH

- SPD........................................................................ FLY THE GREEN
Before extending the slats/flaps, it is better to fly at the bottom of the speed scale green area, and to be in straight flight..

- APPR SPD...................................................................FLY THE BUG
During the approach, the bug indicates Vapp.
